spell.name: Reincarnate

m.text: a ruby worth 10,000+ GP, which the spell consumes

entries: With a touch, you revive a dead creature that has been dead for no more than a month, didn't die of old age, and wasn't Undead when it died.
The creature returns to life with all its {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}. This spell also neutralizes any poisons that affected the creature at the time of death.

Coming back from the dead is an ordeal. The target takes a -4 penalty to {@conditionsdiseases Exhaustion|XPHB}. Every time the target finishes a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}, the penalty is reduced by 1 until it becomes 0.

Casting this spell to revive a creature that has been dead for 365 days or longer taxes you. Until you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}, you can't cast spells again, and you have {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on {@variantrule D20 Test|XPHB|D20 Tests}.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: You can revive a dead creatura that has been dead for double the time for each spell slot level above 7.

spell.name: Silvery Barbs

time.condition: which you take when a creature you can see within 60 feet of yourself succeeds on an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw

entries: You magically distract the triggering creature and turn its momentary uncertainty into encouragement for another creature. The triggering creature must reroll the {@dice d20} and use the lower roll.

You can then choose a different creature you can see within range (you can choose yourself). The chosen creature has advantage on the next attack roll, ability check, or saving throw it makes within 1 minute. A creature can be empowered by only one use of this spell at a time.
